scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Holy Family on a journey, with the Virgin Mary seated on a donkey, holding the Christ Child. Joseph walks beside them, leading the donkey. In the background, a procession of soldiers with spears and helmets advances, suggesting a narrative of flight or pursuit. Above, architectural elements frame the scene, including ornate arches and towers, with figures of angels and a fallen man in a celestial or decorative upper register. The landscape includes hills and foliage, with a walled city visible in the distance.
